      • readdUser

        @Transactional
public void readdUser(PmdbUser user)
        Description copied from interface: UserDao
        Re-add a user to the system. Typically by syncing them in from cloud storage. Special case of adding a user. When saving with this method, the encrypted password is used rather than an unencrypted password. Ensure that the encrypted password is set accordingly.
        Specified by:
        readdUser in interface UserDao
        Parameters:
        user - user to add

      • saveUser

        @Transactional
public void saveUser(PmdbUser user)
        Description copied from interface: UserDao
        Save changes to existing user. Should not be called for new users. Password is not updated within this method call. To change user password, call the changePassword method.
        Specified by:
        saveUser in interface UserDao
        Parameters:
        user - user to save

      • searchUsers

        public List<PmdbUser> searchUsers(String searchString)
        Description copied from interface: UserDao
        Returns users with usernames that contain the provided search string. Search is case insensitive.
        Specified by:
        searchUsers in interface UserDao
        Parameters:
        searchString - search string
        Returns:

      • delete

        @Transactional
public void delete(String username)
        Description copied from interface: UserDao
        Deletes user of given username. Operation will fail if there are any other tables other than the user details table with foreign keys referencing the user.
        Specified by:
        delete in interface UserDao
        Parameters:
        username - username of user to delete
